shadow.name: VANITY
shadow.description: Speaking to be seen, words without substance
shadow.thought_pattern: I need to say something impressive. People need to notice me.

gift.name: DISCRIMINATION
gift.description: Knowing when to speak and when to be silent
gift.thought_pattern: I speak only what wants to be spoken. Silence is also communication.
gift.emotional_state: Confidence in both voice and silence

siddhi.name: PURITY
siddhi.description: Words as sacred transmission, speech as prayer
siddhi.thought_pattern: My words are not mine. Truth speaks through me.

inversion_protocols.script: You are speaking to avoid feeling. Gate 12 is about precise articulationâ€”quality over quantity. When you perform with words, you dilute your power. True communication requires discrimination. Not everything needs to be said. Practice strategic silence.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Before speaking, pause. Feel if the words want to be spoken or if you're filling space. Choose deliberately.

experiment.hypothesis: If I speak only when truly moved to, my words will carry more impact.
experiment.action: For 5 days, before speaking, pause and ask: 'Does this need to be said?' Speak only clear yeses.

success_criteria.target: Others report feeling more heard, words carry more weight
